page.title: 02MAYER AQUATICS
page.content: {MAYER AQUATICS}is in Shilton lane.At the front of the drive is a huge fish pond with a fountain in the middle.It contains coy carp and goldfish.The shop itself is very large.It has coloured lights all around it.It has a door that you can go in to see what he sells.He sells tanks,treasure chests,plants,model bridges,fish,heat thermometers and much,much more.In the shop is a door and if you go through you can see lots of tropical fish in tanks.We saw,a sea horse,neons,red and gold tailed sharks,catfish etc.At the back of his shop are giant models of eagles,knights and kings for your pond.Also there are lots of fish tanks all differnt shapes and sizes.There are fish tanks that keep the plants alive in water.
